players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie last night. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote for Bob."
Bob: "Alice, you stayed silent. Maybe you saw something? I didn't kill anyone else."
Diana: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I investigated you and found you are mafia. No other suspect. Vote for Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
